57 Leaf Clover.desc: All random effects are rolled {{Color|u|+1}} {{Stack|(+1 per stack)}} times for a favorable outcome.

Aegis.desc: Healing past full grants you a {{Color|h|temporary barrier}} for {{Color|h|50%}} {{Stack|(+50% per stack)}} of the amount you {{Color|h|healed}}.
Aegis.quote: Healing past full grants you a temporary barrier.

Armor-Piercing Rounds.desc: Deal an additional {{Color|d|20%}} damage {{Stack|(+20% per stack)}} to bosses.

AtG Missile Mk. 1.desc: {{Color|d|10%}} chance to fire a missile that deals {{Color|d|300%}} {{Stack|(+300% per stack)}} TOTAL damage.

Backup Magazine.desc: Add {{Color|u|+1}} {{Stack|(+1 per stack)}} charge of your {{Color|u|Secondary skill}}.
Backup Magazine.quote: Add an extra charge of your Secondary skill.

Bandolier.desc: {{Color|u|18%}} {{Stack|(+10% per stack)}} chance on kill to drop an ammo pack that {{Color|u|resets all skill cooldowns}}.
Bandolier.quote: Chance on kill to drop an ammo pack that resets all skill cooldowns.

Berzerker's Pauldron.desc: {{Color|d|Killing 3 enemies}} within {{Color|d|1}} second sends you into a {{Color|d|frenzy}} for {{Color|d|6s}} {{Stack|(+4s per stack)}}. Increases {{Color|u|movement speed}} by {{Color|u|50%}} and {{Color|d|attack speed}} by {{Color|d|100%}}.
Berzerker's Pauldron.quote: Enter a frenzy after killing 3 enemies in quick succession.

Brainstalks.desc: Upon killing an elite monster, {{Color|d|enter a frenzy}} for {{Color|d|4s}} {{Stack|(+4s per stack)}} where {{Color|u|skills have no cooldowns}}.
Brainstalks.quote: Skills have NO cooldowns for a short period after killing an elite.

Brilliant Behemoth.desc: All your {{Color|d|attacks explode}} in a {{Color|d|4m}} {{Stack|(+2.5m per stack)}} radius for a bonus {{Color|d|60%}} TOTAL damage to nearby enemies.

Brittle Crown.desc:
{{Color|u|30% chance on hit}} to gain {{Color|u|2 gold}} {{Stack|(+2 per stack)}}. {{Color|u|Scales over time}}.

{{Color|hp|Lose gold}} on taking damage equal to {{Color|hp|100%}} {{Stack|(+100% per stack)}} of the {{Color|hp|maximum health percentage you lost}}.
Brittle Crown.quote: Gain gold on hit... {{Color|#FF7F7F|BUT lose gold on getting hit}}.

Bundle of Fireworks.desc: Activating an interactable {{Color|d|launches 8 {{Stack|(+4 per stack)}} fireworks}} that deal {{Color|d|300%}} base damage.
Bundle of Fireworks.quote: Activating an interactable launches fireworks at nearby enemies.

Bustling Fungus.desc: After standing still for {{Color|h|2}} seconds, create a zone that {{Color|h|heals}} for {{Color|h|4.5%}} {{Stack|(+2.25% per stack)}} of your {{Color|h|health}} every second to all allies within {{Color|h|3m}} {{Stack|(+1.5m per stack)}}.
Bustling Fungus.quote: Heal all nearby allies after standing still for 2 seconds.

Cautious Slug.desc: Increases {{Color|h|passive health regeneration}} by {{Color|h|3 hp/s}} {{Stack|(+3 hp/s per stack)}} while outside of combat.

Ceremonial Dagger.desc: Killing an enemy fires out {{Color|d|3}} {{Color|d|homing daggers}} that deal {{Color|d|150%}} {{Stack|(+150% per stack)}} base damage.
Ceremonial Dagger.quote: Killing an enemy releases homing daggers.

Chronobauble.desc: {{Color|u|Slow}} enemies on hit for {{Color|u|-60% movement speed}} for {{Color|u|2s}} {{Stack|(+2s per stack)}}.

Corpsebloom.desc: {{Color|h|Heal +100%}} {{Stack|(+100% per stack)}} more. {{Color|h|All healing is applied over time}}. Can {{Color|h|heal}} for a {{Color|h|maximum}} of {{Color|h|10%}} {{Stack|(reduced by 50% per stack)}} of your {{Color|h|health per second}}.
Corpsebloom.quote: Double your healing... {{Color|#FF7F7F|BUT it's applied over time}}.

Crowbar.desc: Deal {{Color|d|150%}} {{Stack|(+50% per stack)}} damage to enemies above {{Color|d|90% health}}.
Crowbar.quote: Deal more damage to healthy enemies.

Dio's Best Friend.desc: {{Color|u|Upon death}}, this item will be {{Color|u|consumed}} and you will {{Color|h|return to life}} with {{Color|h|3 seconds of invulnerability}}.

Energy Drink.desc: {{Color|u|Sprint speed}} is improved by {{Color|u|30%}} {{Stack|(+20% per stack)}}.

Focus Crystal.desc: Increase damage to enemies within {{Color|d|13m}} by {{Color|d|15%}} {{Stack|(+15% per stack)}}.
Focus Crystal.quote: Deal bonus damage to nearby enemies.

Fresh Meat.desc: Increases {{Color|h|base health regeneration}} by {{Color|h|+2 hp/s}} for {{Color|u|3s}} {{Stack|(+3s per stack)}} after killing an enemy.
Fresh Meat.quote: Regenerate health after killing an enemy.

Frost Relic.desc: Killing an enemy surrounds you with an {{Color|d|ice storm}} that deals {{Color|d|600% damage per second}}. The storm {{Color|d|grows with every kill}}, increasing its radius by {{Color|d|1m}}. Stacks up to {{Color|d|6m}} {{Stack|(+6m per stack)}}.
Frost Relic.quote: Killing enemies surrounds you with an ice storm.

Fuel Cell.desc: Hold an {{Color|u|additional equipment charge}} {{Stack|(+1 per stack)}}. {{Color|u|Reduce equipment cooldown}} by {{Color|u|15%}} {{Stack|(+15% per stack)}}.
Fuel Cell.quote: Hold an additional equipment charge. Reduce equipment cooldown.

Gasoline.desc: Killing an enemy {{Color|d|ignites}} all enemies within {{Color|d|12m}} {{Stack|(+4m per stack)}}. Enemies {{Color|d|burn}} for {{Color|d|150%}} {{Stack|(+75% per stack)}} base damage.
Gasoline.quote: Killing enemies sets nearby enemies on fire.

Genesis Loop.desc: Falling below {{Color|hp|25% health}} causes you to explode, dealing {{Color|d|6000% base damage}}. Recharges every {{Color|u|30 seconds}} {{Stack|(-50% per stack)}}.
Genesis Loop.quote: Fire an electric nova at low health.

Gesture of the Drowned.desc: {{Color|u|Reduce Equipment cooldown}} by {{Color|u|50%}} {{Stack|(+15% per stack)}}. Forces your Equipment to {{Color|u|activate}} whenever it is off {{Color|u|cooldown}}.
Gesture of the Drowned.quote: Dramatically reduce Equipment cooldown... {{Color|#FF7F7F|BUT it automatically activates}}.

Ghor's Tome.desc: {{Color|u|4%}} {{Stack|(+4% on stack)}} chance on kill to drop a treasure worth {{Color|u|$25}}. {{Color|u|Scales over time.}}
Ghor's Tome.quote: Chance on kill to drop a treasure.

H3AD-5T v2.desc: Increase {{Color|u|jump height}}. Creates a {{Color|d|10m}} radius {{Color|d|kinetic explosion}} on hitting the ground, dealing {{Color|d|2300%}} base damage that scales up with {{Color|d|speed}}. Recharges in {{Color|d|10}} {{Stack|(-50% per stack)}} seconds.
H3AD-5T v2.quote: Increase jump height. Hold 'Use' to slam down to the ground.

Halcyon Seed.desc: Summon {{Color|d|Aurelionite}} during the teleporter event. It has {{Color|d|100% {{Stack|(+50% per stack)}} damage}} and {{Color|h|100% {{Stack|(+100% per stack)}} health}}.
Halcyon Seed.quote: Summon Aurelionite during the Teleporter event.

Happiest Mask.desc: Killing enemies has a {{Color|d|7%}} chance to {{Color|d|spawn a ghost}} of the killed enemy with {{Color|d|1500%}} damage. Lasts {{Color|d|30s}} {{Stack|(+30s per stack)}}.
Happiest Mask.quote: Chance on killing an enemy to summon a ghost.

Hardlight Afterburner.desc: Add {{Color|u|+2}} {{Stack|(+2 per stack)}} charges of your {{Color|u|Utility skill}}. {{Color|u|Reduces Utility skill cooldown}} by {{Color|u|33%}}.
Hardlight Afterburner.quote: Add 2 extra charges of your Utility skill. Reduce Utility skill cooldown.

Harvester's Scythe.desc: Gain {{Color|d|5% critical chance}} {{Stack|(+0% per stack)}}. {{Color|d|Critical strikes}} {{Color|h|heal}} for {{Color|h|8}} {{Stack|(+4 per stack)}} {{Color|h|health}}.

Infusion.desc: Killing an enemy increases your {{Color|h|health permanently}} by {{Color|h|1}}, up to a {{Color|h|maximum}} of {{Color|h|100 {{Stack|(+100 per stack)}} health}}.
Infusion.quote: Killing an enemy permanently increases your health, up to 100.

Kjaro's Band.desc: {{Color|d|8%}} chance on hit to strike an enemy with a {{Color|d|runic flame tornado}}, dealing {{Color|d|500%}} {{Stack|(+250% per stack)}} TOTAL damage.
Kjaro's Band.quote: Chance on hit to strike an enemy with a runic flame tornado.

Leeching Seed.desc: Dealing damage {{Color|h|heals}} you for {{Color|h|1 {{Stack|(+1 per stack)}} health}}.

Lens-Maker's Glasses.desc: Your attacks have a {{Color|d|10%}} {{Stack|(+10% per stack)}} chance to '{{Color|d|Critically Strike}}', dealing {{Color|d|double damage}}.
Lens-Maker's Glasses.quote: Chance to 'Critically Strike', dealing double damage.

Lepton Daisy.desc: Release a {{Color|h|healing nova}} during the Teleporter event, {{Color|h|healing}} all nearby allies for {{Color|h|50%}} of their maximum health. Occurs {{Color|h|1}} {{Stack|(+1 per stack)}} times.
Lepton Daisy.quote: Periodically release a healing nova during the Teleporter event.

Little Disciple.desc: Fire a {{Color|d|tracking wisp}} for {{Color|d|100% {{Stack|(+100% per stack)}} damage}}. Fires every 0.5 seconds while sprinting.

Medkit.desc: {{Color|h|Heal}} for {{Color|h|10 {{Stack|(+10 per stack)}} health}} 1.1 seconds after getting hurt.
Medkit.quote: Receive a delayed heal after taking damage.

Monster Tooth.desc: Killing an enemy spawns a {{Color|h|healing orb}} that heals for {{Color|h|8 {{Stack|(+8 per stack)}} health}}.
Monster Tooth.quote: Drop a healing orb on kill.

N'kuhana's Opinion.desc: Store {{Color|h|100%}} {{Stack|(+100% per stack)}} of healing as {{Color|h|Soul Energy}}. After your {{Color|h|Soul Energy}} reaches {{Color|h|10%}} of your {{Color|h|maximum health}}, {{Color|d|fire a skull}} that deals {{Color|d|250%}} of your {{Color|h|Soul Energy}} as {{Color|d|damage}}.

Old Guillotine.desc: Instantly kill Elite monsters below {{Color|hp|20% {{Stack|(+20% per stack)}} health}}.
Old Guillotine.quote: Instantly kill low health Elite monsters.

Old War Stealthkit.desc: Chance on taking damage to gain {{Color|u|40% movement speed}} and {{Color|u|invisibility}} for {{Color|u|3s}} {{Stack|(+1.5s per stack)}}. Chance increases the more damage you take.
Old War Stealthkit.quote: Turn invisible on taking heavy damage.

Personal Shield Generator.desc: Gain a {{Color|h|shield}} equal to {{Color|h|8%}} {{Stack|(+8% per stack)}} of your maximum health. Recharges outside of danger.

Predatory Instincts.desc: Gain {{Color|d|5% critical chance}} {{Stack|(+0% per stack)}}. {{Color|d|Critical strikes}} increase {{Color|d|attack speed}} by {{Color|d|12%}}. Maximum cap of {{Color|d|36% {{Stack|(+24% per stack)}} attack speed}}.
Predatory Instincts.quote: 'Critical Strikes' increase attack speed. Stacks 3 times.

Queen's Gland.desc: Every 30 seconds, {{Color|u|summon a Beetle Guard}} with bonus {{Color|d|300%}} damage and {{Color|h|100% health}}. Can have up to {{Color|u|1}} {{Stack|(+1 per stack)}} Guards at a time.

Razorwire.desc: Getting hit causes you to explode in a burst of razors, dealing {{Color|d|160% damage}}. Hits up to {{Color|d|5}} {{Stack|(+2 per stack)}} targets in a {{Color|d|25m}} {{Stack|(+10m per stack)}} radius
Razorwire.quote: Retaliate in a burst of razors on taking damage.

Red Whip.desc: Leaving combat boosts your {{Color|u|movement speed}} by {{Color|u|30%}} {{Stack|(+30% per stack)}}.

Resonance Disc.desc: Killing enemies charges the Resonance Disc. The disc launches itself toward a target for {{Color|d|300%}} base damage {{Stack|(+300% per stack)}}, piercing all enemies it doesn't kill, and then explodes for {{Color|d|1000%}} base damage {{Stack|(+1000% per stack)}}. Returns to the user, striking all enemies along the way for {{Color|d|300%}} base damage {{Stack|(+300% per stack)}}.
Resonance Disc.quote: Obtain a Resonance Disc charged by killing enemies. Fires automatically when fully charged.

Runald's Band.desc: {{Color|d|8%}} chance on hit to strike an enemy with a {{Color|d|runic ice blast}}, {{Color|u|slowing}} them by {{Color|u|80%}} and dealing {{Color|d|250%}} {{Stack|(+125% per stack)}} TOTAL damage.
Runald's Band.quote: Chance on hit to strike an enemy with a runic ice blast.

Rusted Key.desc: A {{Color|u|hidden cache}} containing an item will appear in a random location {{Color|u|on each stage}}. {{Stack|(Increases rarity of the item per stack)}}.
Rusted Key.quote: Gain access to a Rusty Lockbox that contains treasure.

Sentient Meat Hook.desc: {{Color|d|20%}} {{Stack|(+20% per stack)}} chance on hit to {{Color|d|fire homing hooks}} at up to {{Color|d|10}} {{Stack|(+5 per stack)}} enemies for {{Color|d|100%}} TOTAL damage.
Sentient Meat Hook.quote: Chance to hook all nearby enemies.

Shaped Glass.desc: Increase base damage by {{Color|d|100%}} {{Stack|(+100% per stack)}}. {{Color|h|Reduce maximum health by 50%}} {{Stack|(+50% per stack)}}.
Shaped Glass.quote: Double your damage... {{Color|#FF7F7F|BUT halve your health}}.

Shattering Justice.desc: After hitting an enemy {{Color|d|5}} times, reduce their {{Color|d|armor}} by {{Color|d|60}} for {{Color|d|8}} {{Stack|(+8 per stack)}} seconds.
Shattering Justice.quote: Reduce the armor of enemies after repeatedly striking them.

Sticky Bomb.desc: {{Color|d|5%}} {{Stack|(+5% per stack)}} chance on hit to attach a {{Color|d|bomb}} to an enemy, detonating for {{Color|d|180%}} TOTAL damage.
Sticky Bomb.quote: Chance on hit to attach a bomb to enemies.

Strides of Heresy.desc:
{{Color|u|Replace your Utility Skill}} with {{Color|u|Shadowfade}}.

Fade away, becoming {{Color|u|intangible}} and gaining {{Color|u|+30% movement speed}}. {{Color|h|Heal}} for {{Color|h|25% {{Stack|(+25% per stack)}} of your maximum health}}. Lasts 3 {{Stack|(+3 per stack)}} seconds.

Stun Grenade.desc: {{Color|u|5%}} {{Stack|(+5% on stack)}} chance on hit to {{Color|u|stun}} enemies for {{Color|u|2 seconds}}.

Titanic Knurl.desc: {{Color|h|Increase maximum health}} by {{Color|h|40}} {{Stack|(+40 per stack)}} and {{Color|h|health regeneration}} by {{Color|h|1.6 {{Stack|(+1.6 per stack)}} health / second}}.

Tonic Affliction.quote: Reduce ALL stats when not under the effects of Spinel Tonic.

Topaz Brooch.desc: Gain a {{Color|h|temporary barrier}} on kill for {{Color|h|15 health}} {{Stack|(+15 per stack)}}.
Topaz Brooch.quote: Gain a temporary barrier on kill.

Tougher Times.desc: {{Color|h|15%}} {{Stack|(+15% per stack)}} chance to {{Color|h|block}} incoming damage. {{Color|u|Unaffected by luck}}.

Transcendence.desc: {{Color|h|Convert}} all but {{Color|h|1 health}} into {{Color|h|regenerating shields}}. {{Color|h|Gain 50% {{Stack|(+25% per stack)}} maximum health}}.
Transcendence.quote: Convert all your health into shield. Increase maximum health.

Tri-Tip Dagger.desc: {{Color|d|15%}} {{Stack|(+15% per stack)}} chance to {{Color|d|bleed}} an enemy for {{Color|d|240%}} base damage.
Tri-Tip Dagger.quote: Chance to bleed enemies on hit.

Ukulele.desc: {{Color|d|25%}} chance to fire {{Color|d|chain lighting}} for {{Color|d|80%}} TOTAL damage on up to {{Color|d|3}} {{Stack|(+2 per stack)}} targets within {{Color|d|20m}} {{Stack|(+2m per stack)}}.

Unstable Tesla Coil.desc: Fire out {{Color|d|lightning}} that hits {{Color|d|3}} {{Stack|(+2 per stack)}} enemies for {{Color|d|200%}} base damage every {{Color|d|0.5s}}. The Tesla Coil switches off every {{Color|d|10 seconds}}.
Unstable Tesla Coil.quote: Shock all nearby enemies every 10 seconds.

Visions of Heresy.desc:
{{Color|u|Replace your Primary Skill}} with {{Color|u|Hungering Gaze}}.

Fire a flurry of {{Color|u|tracking shards}} that detonate after a delay, dealing {{Color|d|120%}} base damage. Hold up to 12 charges {{Stack|(+12 per stack)}} that reload after 2 seconds {{Stack|(+2 per stack)}}.
Visions of Heresy.quote: Replace your Primary Skill with 'Hungering Gaze'.

Wake of Vultures.desc: Gain the {{Color|d|power}} of any killed elite monster for {{Color|d|8s}} {{Stack|(+5s per stack)}}.
Wake of Vultures.quote: Temporarily steal the power of slain elites.

War Horn.desc: Activating your Equipment gives you {{Color|d|+70% attack speed}} for {{Color|d|8s}} {{Stack|(+4s per stack)}}.
War Horn.quote: Activating your Equipment gives you a burst of attack speed.

Warbanner.desc: On {{Color|u|level up}} drop a banner that strengthens all allies within {{Color|u|16m}} {{Stack|(+8m per stack)}}. Raise {{Color|d|attack}} and {{Color|u|movement speed}} by {{Color|d|30%}}.
Warbanner.quote: Drop a Warbanner on leveling up, giving you great strength.

Wax Quail.desc: {{Color|u|Jumping}} while {{Color|u|sprinting}} boosts you forward by {{Color|u|10m}} {{Stack|(+10m per stack)}}.
Wax Quail.quote: Jumping while sprinting boosts you forward.

Will-o'-the-wisp.desc: On killing an enemy, spawn a {{Color|d|lava pillar}} in a {{Color|d|12m}} {{Stack|(+2.4m per stack)}} radius for {{Color|d|350%}} {{Stack|(+280% per stack)}} base damage.
